bibl.title: Bronze Coinage of Ptolemaic Egypt in the Second Century BC.
bibl.note: Characteristics and classification of series 6. - Characteristics and classification of Series 7. - Toward an absolute chronology. - The documentary evidence and the coinage. - Face values of the bronze coins. - Pp. 60-62: Appendix 1. Hoards; 63-68: Appendix 2. Metrology of the second-century bronze series; - 69-72: Appendix 3 (with Maryse Blet-Lemarquand). Elemental analyses of second-century Ptolemaic coinage; - 73: Appendix 4. Prices. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Thomas Faucher & Catharine Lorber, Bronze Coinage of Ptolemaic Egypt in the Second Century BC.
AJN 2nd S., 22 (2010) pp. 35-80, 13 tabl., 7 graphiques et pll. 18-22.

Characteristics and classification of series 6. - Characteristics and classification of Series 7. - Toward an absolute chronology. - The documentary evidence and the coinage. - Face values of the bronze coins. - Pp. 60-62: Appendix 1. Hoards; 63-68: Appendix 2. Metrology of the second-century bronze series; - 69-72: Appendix 3 (with Maryse Blet-Lemarquand). Elemental analyses of second-century Ptolemaic coinage; - 73: Appendix 4. Prices. - Avec résumé en anglais.
